item.title: Xen quick start guide on openSuSE Linux 10.3
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: If you had installed VMWare workstation on any Linux, you may have kernel source problem. Because a default Linux installation do not include kernel source package. I’m just saying that you should always play with open source Virtualization, Xen or Virtial Box are all good stuff to run ;)  . I got some screen-shots for you if you don’t have idea how do install Xen. The true is Xen is faster then VMWare on my laptop. I would not work with VMWare anymore.My laptop is a DELL D630 with openSuSE Linux 10.3 and XP (just for work).1) Install Xen packages via yast from DVD.
